## Communication.apiProxy() method

Creates a Proxy for a remote service api.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apiProxy<T extends object>(instanceToken: EnvironmentInstanceToken | Promise<EnvironmentInstanceToken>, { id: api }: IDTag, serviceComConfig?: ServiceComConfig<T>): AsyncApi<T>;
```
